conbody.p: Google Pub/Sub Subscriber origindefault credentials providerWhen configured to use the Google Application Default Credentials, the origin checks for the credentials file defined in the GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS environment variable. If the environment variable doesn't exist and is running on a virtual machine (VM) in Google Cloud, the origin uses the built-in service account associated with the virtual machine instance.
For more information about the default credentials, see Google Application Default Credentials in the Google Developer documentation.
